message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with scene text segmentation, which is a computer vision task related to image analysis and processing. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also mentions the use of Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs), which are a popular machine learning technique, suggesting that cs.CL (Computation and Language) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) are also likely sub-categories. Additionally, the paper proposes a weakly supervised learning approach, which falls under the scope of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper deals with text segmentation, which is a sub-topic of information retrieval, suggesting that cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is a possible sub-category as well.
